resources.string:
Chandigarh, The capital of PUNJAB and HARYANA and also known as the "THE CITY BEAUTIFUL" and entirely designed by French architect "Le Corbusier". 

It's one of the greenest cities in India with some parks, open spaces, perfect design, clean surroundings, gardens, and lakes, etc. that make it an ideal place to dwell and travel. Everything is so well managed here from A to Z that makes this city the first choice for foreigners and locals. 

Moreover, the four primary functions of the city are to promote healthy clean living, good working conditions, care of body and soul and proper circulation of traffic in a disciplined way.
